Package ch.nolix.system.client

Class Client<C extends Client<C>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.OptionalSignableElement<C>
      • ch.nolix.system.client.Client<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - The type of a client.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closable, OptionalSignable<C>, Resettable, Signable<C>, Signed, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseGUIClient, GUIBackClient, GUIFrontClient, StandardClient

    public abstract class Client<C extends Client<C>>
extends OptionalSignableElement<C>
implements Closable, Resettable
    A client is like an end point with comfortable functionalities.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
